Marvel.com's Third Annual Costoberfest: a month long celebration of cosplay & costuming!

Marvel’s use of all photos are governed by the Marvel.com Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. Costoberfest 2013

With it being the Unofficial National Day of Cosplay, we bring you one last but not least costoberfest feature: the future of cosplay & costuming! 

Happy Halloween & Costoberfest everyone! Stay tuned for my recap post at marvel.com/cosplay

Marvel’s use of all photos are governed by the Marvel.com Terms of Use http://bit.ly/ol9WFp and Privacy Policy http://bit.ly/irv6zy. Thank you for all you have submitted your photos! We are no longer accepting cosplay submissions for Costoberfest 2012!

Every day, starting October 1st, we will pick a cosplayer or costumer to profile on Marvel’s Facebook and twitter. For more information, head over to Judy’s blog post: http://bit.ly/SATnSP

Marvel’s use of all photos are governed by the Marvel.com Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.

(Source: fans.marvel.com) Costoberfest 2012

We here at the Marvel offices have weathered that perky Sandy, and would like to wish you and your families very Happy Halloween! In honor of this merry day of costuming & cosplay, and as Costoberfest is coming to a close, we bring you a splattering of cosplay from all over the Marvel Universe! Starting from left: 

Angelus as Loki (Photo by JasonElpheuswong), Bartłomiej as Tony Stark (Photo by DoleczekFoto), Christi as Nightcrawler, Lauren as Emma (Photo by ) Ted as Warlock, Gina as Songbird (Photo by Julia G.), Rick as Daredevil, Kelsey as Sif (Fashion by God Saves the Queen Fashions, Photo by Brian Humphrey), Meryle as Ms. Marvel (Photo by Foques Photo),  Josh, Kart and T as Warriors Three, and Ian as Omega Red (Photo by Eleventh Photography)

Left to right is Andrea, Princess Mentality Cosplay and Ole-Willhelm. These three cosplayers are a true tale of the internationality of fandom, as they hail from Italy, US and Norway!

Photos by Moggio Manuel, Eurobeat Kasumi Photography and  Ole Kristian Haagenrud.
